mapper.sql: p.postion_id, p.company_id, p.postion_name, p.postion_company, p.postion_ym, p.postion_mm, p.postion_space, p.postion_time, p.postion_education, p.postion_exp, p.postion_age, p.postion_description, p.postion_welfare, p.filed1,p.publish_time, p.over_time, p.postion_department, p.people_number, p.postion_specialty,p.publish_month, p.education_entrance,p.force_age,p.force_specialty, c.company_id, c.company_name, c.company_picture, c.company_scale, c.company_nature, c.domain, c.skill, c.company_location,c.company_city,c.company_x,c.company_y,c.company_intro,c.company_space, w.welfare_id, w.welfare_name, f.field_id, f.field_name

p.postion_id, p.company_id, p.postion_name, p.postion_company, p.postion_ym, p.postion_mm, p.postion_space, p.postion_time, p.postion_education, p.postion_exp, p.postion_age, p.postion_description, p.postion_welfare, p.delete_flat,p.publish_time, p.over_time, p.postion_department, p.people_number, p.postion_specialty,p.publish_month, p.force_age,p.force_specialty,p.education_entrance
mapper.select:
select
from xz_postion p LEFT JOIN xz_company c on p.company_id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN xz_company_welfare w on c.company_id = w.company_id LEFT JOIN xz_company_domain d on c.company_id = d.company_id LEFT JOIN xz_field f on d.field_id = f.field_id where p.delete_flat = 0 and (f.field_type = 1 or f.field_type is null) and p.postion_id in
#{pid}
ORDER BY p.publish_time DESC,d.domain_id

mapper.update: update xz_postion set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, postion_name = #{postionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postion_company = #{postionCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postion_ym = #{postionYm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, postion_mm = #{postionMm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, postion_space = #{postionSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postion_time = #{postionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, postion_education = #{postionEducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postion_exp = #{postionExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postion_age = #{postionAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postion_description = #{postionDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postion_welfare = #{postionWelfare,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, publish_time = #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, over_time = #{overTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, postion_department = #{postionDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, people_number = #{peopleNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, postion_specialty = #{postionSpecialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publish_month = #{publishMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, education_entrance = #{educationEntrance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, force_age = #{forceAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, force_specialty = #{forceSpecialty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_flat = #{deleteFlat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, filed1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed2 = #{filed2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed3 = #{filed3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where postion_id = #{postionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM xz_postion p WHERE p.company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select DISTINCT (postion_space) FROM xz_postion WHERE company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
FROM xz_postion p LEFT JOIN xz_company_welfare w ON p.company_id = w.company_id LEFT JOIN xz_company c ON p.company_id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN xz_company_domain d on c.company_id = d.company_id LEFT JOIN xz_field f on d.field_id = f.field_id WHERE p.postion_id=#{postionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from xz_postion p where p.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND p.postion_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{postionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
mapper.insert:
insert into xz_postion_collect
postion_id,
member_id,
collect_time,
#{postionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{collectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select: select postion_id,collect_id,collect_time from xz_postion_collect where member_id=#{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: update xz_postion set postion_welfare = #{postionWelfare,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where postion_id = #{postionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) from xz_postion_collect WHERE member_id=#{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and postion_id=#{postionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
